///
/// Part Slicer Configuration File
///

/// Name of the file to load
part_file: 	Parts\2cm Nonagon.stl

/// Name of the file to output to
output_file:	test.txt

/// Slicer limits in mm
slice_start:	0
slice_stop:	20
slice_step:	20

/// Perimeter path settings
perim_count:	3

/// Infill settings
fill_angle:	0
fill_spacing:	0.5

/// Machine parameters
nozzle_dia:	0.2
